mapper.select: SELECT M.MEMBER_NUMBER ,M.MEMBER_NAME ,TO_CHAR(M.MEMBER_BIRTH, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS MEMBER_BIRTH FROM DT_CHAT_SESSION CS JOIN DT_MEMBER M ON CS.MEMBER_NUMBER = M.MEMBER_NUMBER WHERE CS.DOCTOR_NUMBER = #{doctorNumber}
SELECT MEMBER_NAME, TO_CHAR(MEMBER_BIRTH, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS MEMBER_BIRTH FROM DT_MEMBER WHERE MEMBER_NUMBER = #{memberNumber}

SELECT M.MEMBER_NUMBER , D.DOCTOR_NAME , H.HOSPITAL_NAME , M.MEMBER_NAME , TO_CHAR(M.MEMBER_BIRTH, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS MEMBER_BIRTH FROM DT_CHAT_SESSION CS JOIN DT_DOCTOR D ON CS.DOCTOR_NUMBER = D.DOCTOR_NUMBER JOIN DT_MEMBER M ON CS.MEMBER_NUMBER = M.MEMBER_NUMBER JOIN DT_HOSPITAL H ON H.HOSPITAL_NUMBER = D.HOSPITAL_NUMBER WHERE M.MEMBER_NUMBER = #{memberNumber} AND D.DOCTOR_NUMBER = #{doctorNumber}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO DT_CHART (CHART_NUMBER, CHART_NAME, CHART_MEDICINE, CHART_DAY, CHART_TIME, CHART_PERIOD, MEMBER_NUMBER, DOCTOR_NUMBER, CHART_WRITE_DATE) VALUES (CHART_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{chartName}, #{chartMedicine}, #{chartDay}, #{chartTime}, #{chartPeriod}, #{memberNumber}, #{doctorNumber}, SYSDATE)
mapper.select: SELECT H.HOSPITAL_NAME , D.DOCTOR_NAME FROM DT_HOSPITAL H JOIN DT_DOCTOR D ON H.HOSPITAL_NUMBER=D.HOSPITAL_NUMBER WHERE D.DOCTOR_NUMBER=#{doctorNumber}

SELECT CS.SESSION_NUMBER, CS.DOCTOR_NUMBER FROM DT_DOCTOR D JOIN DT_HOSPITAL H ON D.HOSPITAL_NUMBER = H.HOSPITAL_NUMBER JOIN DT_CHAT_SESSION CS ON CS.DOCTOR_NUMBER = D.DOCTOR_NUMBER JOIN DT_MEMBER M ON CS.MEMBER_NUMBER = M.MEMBER_NUMBER WHERE M.MEMBER_NUMBER = #{memberNumber} AND D.DOCTOR_NUMBER = ( SELECT DD.DOCTOR_NUMBER FROM DT_DOCTOR DD JOIN DT_HOSPITAL HH ON DD.HOSPITAL_NUMBER = HH.HOSPITAL_NUMBER WHERE DD.DOCTOR_NAME = #{doctorName} AND HH.HOSPITAL_NAME = #{hospitalName})
INSERT INTO DT_CHAT (CHAT_NUMBER, CHAT_TEXT, CHAT_MSG_DATE, SESSION_NUMBER, DOCTOR_NUMBER) VALUES (CHAT_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{chatText} , SYSDATE, #{sessionNumber}, #{doctorNumber})
